name: Minky
overview: The hero is supposed to be a monkey (and the game was supposed to be called 'Minkey'), but since nobody except the graphic artist could recognized that the name of the game was changed and the hero now throws balls instead of bananas in this platformer from Matze1887 Retro Games, released in 2022. An Amiga game that puts you in control of a Monkey(no not a mouse), who must collect coins and other items while avoiding deadly enemies in 28 well designed levels, a lovable character, different enemy types, and as one person said, "The multidirectional scrolling and size of some of the levels is impressive".
